DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose of this study is to examine the effect of N-acetylcysteine (NAC) on the acute effects of Delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (THC). This will be tested by pretreating healthy individuals with NAC and then assessing their responses to THC.
DOC.criteria: Exposed to Cannabis at least once in lifetime Cannabis Naive Individuals with a documented allergy to Nacetylcysteine
